t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: Nike to resume selling directly on Amazon for first time since 2019
s: 3 days ago - Nike confirmed to CNBC that its shoes are returning to Amazon.

s: Crear y mantener una Brand Store es gratis, y no necesitas anunciarte en Amazon para crear una. Una vez que creas tu Brand Store, puedes mostrar tus productos, tu historia de marca y tu contenido de estilo de vida para atraer a los compradores.

t: Amazon Brand Story: Crea la tua Identità - Etailing

t: Amazon Brand Registry: come funziona - Ecommerce Legale
s: September 4, 2023 - Nel Brand Store è possibile mostrare categorie, prodotti più venduti, offerte speciali e pagine aggiuntive che raccontano meglio la storia e l’identità del brand. Si tratta delle inserzioni pay-per-click di Amazon Advertising dedicate ai brand.
